system.notes: Doesn't Deal damage or have regular weapn profile. Instead when performing a Boarding Action, a ship with this weapon can make -10 BS Test instead of -20 Pilot (Spacecraft)+Manoeuvrability Test. Enemy ships trying to escape must make -40 Pilot (Spacecraft)+Manoeuvrability Test to escape rather than -20, although you can simply cut the cable.
